name: 施陽正
objective: 內容包括各種能量形式、能源轉換、物質之熱力性質、熱力學第一定律。
schedule:
週次(日期)　　　　　　　　　　　　進度
1 　　　　      Course Outline & Ch1: Introductionand Basic Concepts
2 　　　　      Ch2: Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis, I
3 　　　　      Ch2: Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis, II
4 　　　　      Ch2: Energy, Energy Transfer, and General Energy Analysis, III
5　　　　      Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, I 
6 　　　　      Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, II 
                      &  Mid-term Exam, I (第一次期中考: Ch1 & Ch2)
7　　　　      Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, III
8 　　　　      Ch3: Properties of Pure Substances, IV
9 　　　　      Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed Systems, I
10 　　              Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed Systems, II  &
                      Mid-term Exam, II (第二次期中考: Ch3)
11 　　              Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed Systems, III
12 　　              Ch4: Energy Analysis of Closed Systems, IV
13                  Ch5: Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes, I
14 　　              Ch5: Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes, II
                      & Mid-term Exam, III (第三次期中考: Ch4)
15 　　              Ch5: Mass and Energy Analysis of Control Volumes, III
16 　　              Ch6: The Second Law of Thermodynamics, I
17 　　              Ch6: The Second Law of Thermodynamics, II
18 　　              Final Exam (期末考: Ch1- Ch6）
scorePolicy:
作業及出席率 10%、期中考 50% (三次取兩次最佳成績計算)、期末考 40%（包含本學期所教授全部範圍）。
注意：無故缺席達三次者，學期總分扣五分。
materials:
教科書：
Cengel, Y.A., and M.A. Boles. 2015. “Thermodynamics : an engineering approach,”Eight edition.

參考書籍：
1. M. J. Moran, and H. N. Shapiro, “Fundamentals of Engineering Thermodynamics,” 5th ed., 2004.
2. C. Borgankke and R.E. Sonntag, "Fundamentals of Thermodynamics", 2014, 8th Version.

Office Hours: 週一、四 15:00~18:00
